thread.title: Tanke Inc. Is Finalizing Merger with Greener Environment & Yulong LLC

author: cnbc.com
title: Tanke Inc. Is Finalizing Merger with Greener Environment & Yulong LLC

organizations.name: greener environment & yulong llc las vegas

text:
LAS VEGAS, Nev., March 13, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Via OTC PR Wire -- Tanke, Inc. (OTC:TNKE) Tanke Inc. and Greener Environment & Yulong LLC are pleased to jointly announce a strategic merger. The Company law firm is rapidly working on all filings and disclosures to bring the company up to date with the OTC Markets to finalized the merger. Upon completion of the transaction, both corporations will continue to operate under their respective names, but the two will consolidate regulatory charters with Greener Environment & Yulong LLC merging into Tanke Inc.
The transaction has been approved by the boards of directors of both corporations and is subject to regulatory approval and approval by the shareholders of Tanke Inc.
Tanke Inc, The Company will keep the investment community and its shareholders informed of the entire process as the details continue to develop. Watch for regular press releases about the company's takeover.
About Greener Environment & Yulong LLC
Specializes in consulting environmental technology transfer into the international markets and is one of the leading manufacturers specializing in making of industrial environmental friendly equipment. It is a large specialized environmental company combined design, supply, installation, commissioning and operation into one.
About Tanke Inc
Tanke Inc. is a developmental stage diversified holding company, with the mission to develop, manage and finance emerging companies in high growth industries. Tanke is focused in the development of environmental technologies.
Forward-Looking Statements
This release contains forward-looking statements that reflect Tanke Inc, plans and expectations. In this press release and related comments by Company management, words like "expect," "anticipate," "estimate," "goal" and similar expressions are used to identify forward-looking statements, representing management's current judgment and expectations about possible future events.
